name: WisdomTree Ireland Limited
goal: WisdomTree's core goal is to treat all investors fairly and to give them the best chance for investment success. WisdomTree supports the creation of a regulatory regime that increases transparency and protects investors, and the ESMA Supervisory Convergence strategic priority.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: EU Financial services legislation and initiatives, including: cross-border distribution of funds; retail financial products market; ETFs; Brexit; MiFID; MAD; Benchmarks; UCITS; EMIR; Corporate Governance.
